body: {greeting} {guest}, welcome to {hotel}. Your room number is {room}, have a great stay!
sample: Good evening Samantha, welcome to Hotel Panda Express. Your room number 127, have a great stay.

body: {greeting} {guest}, I'm Sandy, Manager for {hotel}. We are delighted to have you as our guest. You will be staying in room number {room}
sample: Good afternoon Maggie, I'm Sandy, Manager for Hotel Panda Express. We are delighted to have you as our guest. You will be staying in room number 127.

body: Welcome to {hotel}! {greeting} {guest}, your room number is {room}. Have a wonderful stay with us!
sample: Welcome to Hotel Panda Express! Good afternoon Jacob, your room number is 127. Have a wonderful stay with us!
